lib

Interface ElbService


  • public interface ElbService
    ELBService interface. Provide wrapper services for various operations on AWS ELB API.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • describeLoadBalancer

        com.amazonaws.services.elasticloadbalancing.model.LoadBalancerDescription describeLoadBalancer(java.lang.String elbName)
                                                                                        throws com.amazonaws.AmazonServiceException,
                                                                                               com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException
        Describe an Elastic Load Balancer (ELB) from the provided Name.
        Parameters:
        elbName - the provided ELB Name
        Returns:
        a LoadBalancerDescription object for the ELB, or NULL if the ELB cannot be found
        Throws:
        com.amazonaws.AmazonServiceException - if error occurred while calling AWS API
        com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException - if error occurred while calling AWS API

      • describeInstanceHealthInLoadBalancer

        java.util.List<com.amazonaws.services.elasticloadbalancing.model.InstanceState> describeInstanceHealthInLoadBalancer(java.lang.String elbName)
                                                                                                              throws com.amazonaws.AmazonServiceException,
                                                                                                                     com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException
        Describe the ELB Health status of all Instances in the Load Balancer.
        Parameters:
        elbName - the provided ELB Name
        Returns:
        a list of InstanceState describing the ELB Health status of all Instances in the ELB, or NULL if the ELB cannot be found
        Throws:
        com.amazonaws.AmazonServiceException - if error occurred while calling AWS API
        com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException - if error occurred while calling AWS API

                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Update the ELB Health Check target.
        Parameters:
        elbName - the ELB we want to update
        target - the new Health Check target

        com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException - if error occurred while calling AWS API
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid parameters provided

      • removeTagFromElb

        void removeTagFromElb(java.lang.String elbName,
                      java.lang.String tagKey)
               throws com.amazonaws.AmazonServiceException,
                      com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException,
                      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Remove a particular Tag from a Load Balancer.
        Parameters:
        elbName - the Load Balancer name
        tagKey - the Tag key we want to remove
        Throws:
        com.amazonaws.AmazonServiceException - if error occurred while calling AWS API
        com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException - if error occurred while calling AWS API
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either elbName or tagKey are invalid
